name: Dubble Bubble Shooter
description:
"The best bubble shooter I've ever played", "Beautiful and challenging", "Get this game, it's very fun!".

Dubble brings natural motion bubble shooting to the Mac! The natural movements of the bubbles enable a style of gameplay you haven't experienced in any other bubble shooter.

- Natural motion bubble shooting
- 3 modes: Puzzle, Arcade and Zen
- Unlimited levels

-- GAME INFO --
Dubble was built on a custom physics engine - that means natural, organic movements never seen in a bubble shooter before! Dubble features four fantastic game modes with funky visuals, organic physics, catchy music and juicy sound effects.

Supports full-screen mode under OS X Lion or newer.

We've built three single-player modes to have endless fun with. Play as fast as you can in Arcade mode, as smart as you can in Puzzle mode, or have endless fun in Zen mode. Each mode has its own background music and gets more challenging as you shoot your way through up to 8 colors of organically moving bubbles.

Can you make it to the black bubble!?

-- NOTE to iPhone, iPad and iPod touch users --
This version doesn't contain multiplayer mode, because Macs don't have touchscreens or support for multiple cursors.
